    • Method Detail

      • getSelected

        public Coordinate getSelected()

      • select

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> select(Coordinate coordinate)
        Perform a selection action. If no cell is currently selected, select the given one. If the given cell is adjacent to the previous selected cells, return the two coordinates and reset. If the given cell is not adjacent or is the same with the previous selected cell, reset.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - which has been clicked
        Returns:
        A null object if this is the first cell.
        ArrayList object contains two Coordinate objects if two adjacent cells are selected.
        A null object if the given cell is not adjacent or is the same with the previous selected cell.
